channel.title: stress on babble
channel.description: Recent content in stress on babble

item.title: 006 - Hobbies
item.description: I definitely like the idea of hobbies. Some activity you do just for fun, not for any future gain. Well, maybe you think there is future gain, like it you get really good at the hobby then it will be more enjoyable to practice it. But not future gain as in you think you will be able to like sell your paintings for lots of money and that’s how you’re going to realize your financial life goals.
